title: Sunshine Haldi Ceremony
shortDescription: Bright haldi setup with marigold backdrop and family seating.
description: A warm haldi ceremony package including floral marigold backdrop, fairy lights, stage draping, yellow props, haldi bowl décor, and carpeted seating for guests.

title: Royal Haldi Premium Package
shortDescription: Premium haldi décor with swing, flowers and photo booth.
description: Premium haldi décor including floral swing, deluxe couple seating, LED haldi typography backdrop, marigold tunnel entry, and photo booth frame.

title: Elegant Engagement Evening
shortDescription: Ring ceremony setup with floral walkway and stage.
description: Floral engagement walkway, ring ceremony stage décor with LED backdrop, pastel theme floral arrangements, cake table styling and guest table centerpieces.

title: Family Engagement Mini Setup
shortDescription: Small engagement setup suitable for rooftops.
description: A simple engagement setup with fabric curtains, fairy lights, flower panels and signature ring ceremony table design.

title: Dream Wedding Signature Stage
shortDescription: Grand wedding stage with floral arch and chandelier.
description: Signature wedding package including designer couple stage, floral arch, crystal chandelier, aisle décor, entrance gate, and full lighting system.

title: Classic Budget Wedding Setup
description: Traditional wedding stage, flower panels, LED lights, simple entrance arch, couple seating and basic photo corner.

title: Destination Beach Wedding
shortDescription: Mandap, aisle décor and beachside floral styling.
description: Beach destination wedding setup including mandap, bamboo arch décor, floral walkway, welcome board, sunset theme lighting and couple seating.

title: Mehendi Color Festival
shortDescription: Vibrant mehendi décor with cushions and props.
description: Colorful mehendi setup including floor seating, rangoli patterns, floral backdrop, umbrella décor, fairy lights and music corner.

title: Premium Mehendi Night
shortDescription: Luxury mehendi décor with canopy and live music.
description: Luxurious mehendi night including canopy décor, flower frames, mehendi seating, dhol performance and couple swing arrangement.

title: Family Day Picnic Setup
shortDescription: Family picnic event setup with kids zone.
description: Family event setup with colorful tents, picnic seating, kids game zone, PA system and decorative photo frame corner.

title: Corporate Family Day
description: Corporate-friendly family event setup with branded backdrop, stage, sound, kids activity zone and seating arrangements.

title: Winter Bonfire Night
shortDescription: Cozy bonfire setup with warm lighting.
description: Warm winter evening package including bonfire pit, fairy lights, rug seating, lantern décor and fanush sky release session.

title: Fanush Festival Night
description: Sky lantern release event with fairy lights, music, decorated seating and mini bonfire options for winter nights.

title: Happy New Year Celebration
shortDescription: NYE countdown décor and DJ lights.
description: Countdown backdrop, balloon arches, LED 2024 display, DJ lights, sound system and photo booth props for New Year.

title: Premium Birthday Decoration
description: Premium birthday décor with theme-specific backdrop, arch balloons, cake table setup, fairy lights and photography corner.

title: Kids Cartoon Theme Party
description: Kids theme party including cartoon-themed stage, balloons, character standees, game zone and music.

title: Luxury Anniversary Dinner
shortDescription: Romantic dinner setup with candle lights.
description: Candlelit dinner table décor, rose petals, hanging lights, private seating canopy and soft ambient music.

title: Couple Rooftop Surprise
description: Rooftop couple surprise including LED love letters, candles, petals, fairy lights and elegant table setup.

title: Holud & Gaye Holud Combo
description: Dual event setup covering morning haldi and evening holud, including separate stage designs and lighting.

title: Sangeet Night Celebration
shortDescription: Dance floor, DJ lights, stage décor.
description: Sangeet night with stage décor, dance floor lighting, DJ booth setup, dhol drummers and couple entry tunnel.

title: Barbeque Night Party
description: Outdoor BBQ setup with dining tables, grill station styling, fairy lights and music system.

title: Rooftop Dinner Date
description: Romantic candlelight dinner on rooftop with canopy entry, rose petals decoration and private table.

title: Festival Gate Illumination
description: Festival décor with illuminated entry arch, drapes, floral panels and custom signage.

title: Corporate Product Launch
description: Corporate event setup including LED screen, product stand, stage backdrop, lighting and sound.

title: Fashion Show Runway Setup
description: Complete fashion runway décor with elevated stage, catwalk lighting, side drapes, seating and red carpet.

title: DJ Night Club Experience
description: Party setup including DJ booth, disco lights, fog machine, dance floor and high-energy sound system.

title: Garden Wedding Setup
shortDescription: Outdoor garden wedding with floral walkway.
description: Fresh outdoor ceremony with garden mandap, floral entry walkway, greenery backdrop and meadow theme seating.

title: Winter Night Live Acoustic
description: Small concert setup with acoustic guitarist, warm lighting, winter décor and floor seating.

title: School Annual Function Stage
description: Stage decoration for annual functions including podium signage, backdrop, lighting and award distribution setup.

title: Corporate Meeting Setup
description: Minimal corporate meeting décor including conference table styling, presentation screen, PA system and branding.
